title: Silly City Names Quiz
hint1: Don't let the names fool you!
hint2: Some of these places are more real than you think...
introText:
WELCOME TO THE SILLY CITY NAMES QUIZ!

PREPARE TO VISIT SOME OF THE WORLD'S MOST HILARIOUSLY NAMED PLACES! YES, THESE ARE ALL REAL LOCATIONS. NO, WE'RE NOT MAKING THESE UP.

questions.question: In which country would you find the town of 'Batman'?
What's the name of the small town in Austria that had to change its name from 'F*cking' in 2021?
Which US state is home to the town of 'Truth or Consequences'?
The town of 'Sandwich' is located in which country?
What's the name of the Pennsylvania town that shares its name with a popular chocolate brand?
Which country has a city called 'Dildo'?
Order these real town names by population, smallest to largest: Boring (USA), Sandwich (UK), Batman (Turkey), Accident (USA)
The town of 'No Name' is located in which US state?
What's the name of the Welsh village famous for having the longest place name in Europe?
Which country has both a 'Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha!' and a 'Ha! Ha! Bay'?
The town of 'Why' is located in which US state?
What's the name of the Minnesota town that means 'Camp Kill Women' in Dakota Sioux?
Which Australian territory contains a place called 'Humpty Doo'?
Order these towns from north to south: Chicken (Alaska), Moose Jaw (Saskatchewan), Cut and Shoot (Texas), Taumatawhakatangihangakoauauotamateapokaiwhenuakitanatahu (New Zealand)
The town of 'Disappointment' is found in which country?
How many exclamation points are in the official name of 'Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha!'?
Which state contains both 'Rough and Ready' and 'Cool'?
What's the name of the Swedish village that shares its name with a common computer keyboard character?
The town of 'Weed' is located in which US state?
Which country has a town called 'Dull' that is twinned with 'Boring', Oregon?
